item.title: Sinews of War and Trade: Shipping and Capitalism in the Arabian Peninsula
item.description: Laleh Khalili is a Professor of INternational Politics at Queen Mary University of London and recently (2020) wrote this book. Familiar with her book Time in the Shadows: Confinement in Counterinsurgencies. Blurb This book provides a helpful introduction to the reshapping of global sea trade after decolonisation. I found this book interesting mainly due to my own ignorace of the global maritime industry and how this relates to the importance of the Gulf.
